projectDetails.title: Personal Portfolio Website

projectDetails.title: Home Food Mobile Application
projectDetails.subHeading: Technology Used: React-Native, Redux, BootStrap, Google-FireBase
projectDetails.description: This application makes users order their daily meal by searching their favorite restaurants near their location by tracking it with the map feature, also the application is secured with a Gmail authorization login screen, moreover, a user is also able to create their profile and all this data is stored and hosted by the google firebase.

projectDetails.title: Weather Prediction Web-Application
projectDetails.description: The application helps to predict the accurate weather conditions and temperature

aboutMe.description: Greetings, I would like to introduce myself by first mentioning that I am a passionate software developer with a flavor of interest in the field of research in computer science domain, I am experienced in software development with the primary language as NodeJS and JavaScript in the jio platforms limited, although for competitive programming purpose I prefer java as my first language, moreover in my development experience I have learned to use many dev tools like Kubernetes, Kibana, postman, Kafka, sequelize and many more, in addition to that my data structures and algorithms skills had helped me to optimize my created APIs to a new level, I always try to learn and explore new things in search of various opportunities in the field of software development.

bullets: Full Stack Web and Mobile Development
Interactive Front end as per the design
highlights.heading: Here are a few Highlights:

profile.profileRoleTagLine: Software Enginner | NodeJS | ReactJS | Docker | Kubernetes | AI/ML

peopleDetails.name: Gaurav Sukhatme
peopleDetails.designation: Software consulting Engineer - Cisco | DevNet Associate
peopleDetails.recommendationGiven: It’s rare that you come across standout talent like Sagar. I've known him since middle school. I’m amazed by his ability to make friends with anyone, a skill he uses to full effect when presenting proposals. Sagar would be an asset to any company.

peopleDetails.name: Mugunthan Gunasekaran
peopleDetails.recommendationGiven: Sagar has been exceptional in his work so far. He was never hesitant to face challenges. The journey so far has not been easy but still, Sagar stood up every single time and went beyond his call of duty. His dedication commitment and never settling attitude have saved the project from being escalated, not just once but almost every week. Sagar is definitely an asset to the team!

peopleDetails.name: Padmashree Subramanian
peopleDetails.recommendationGiven: Sagar, your recent work on Jenkins issue resolution has been commendable. The way you exhibited your focus and perseverance is very impressive and will take you to great heights. Your calmness throughout the battle under great pressure is an asset. Happy and proud to have you with us!! Keep up all the good work!

peopleDetails.name: Padmashree Subramanian
peopleDetails.recommendationGiven: Thank you, Sagar - Sagar, if you think nobody noticed all your hard work and the enormous amount of effort that you put in to cross the hurdles, you are wrong! Your unswerving commitment and focus are an asset and will take you to great heights. Thank you so much for all your good work - Much appreciated Keep up the good work.

peopleDetails.name: Padmashree Subramanian
peopleDetails.recommendationGiven: THE MOUNTAIN MOVER - Sagar, your support on the ground to solve all the issues is highly commendable. You have never left any stones unturned, and your attitude to work as a team and keep cool amidst all the pressure is something I would like to learn from you! Best wishes - Keep up the good work
